# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# C extensions
*.so

# Django stuff:
*.log
*.pot
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd
*.db
*.sqlite3

# Django migrations
*/migrations/*

# If you are using Django with PostgreSQL:
*.pgsql

# Local environment settings
.env

# Node.js dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# React build directory
build/
dist/

# Files generated by package managers
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# IDE files (VSCode, PyCharm, etc.)
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python egg files
*.egg
*.egg-info/
dist/
eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.manifest
*.spec

# Pipfile
Pipfile.lock

# Virtual Environment
venv/
ENV/
env/
.venv/
.ENV/
.env.bak/

# Coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.nox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover
.hypothesis/

# PyInstaller
*.manifest
*.spec

# Django static and media folders
staticfiles/
media/

# Pyre type checker
.pyre/

# Local database
*.sqlite3

# pytest
.pytest_cache/
